tier.item: 'The class teacher told the librarian at the library which student the
'The class teacher told the librarian at the library which student the
Dono-seito-ni tannin-wa ____gap1 [koocyoo-ga ____gap2 hon-o yonda-ka] tosyositu-de sisyo-ni iimasita
which student-dat class teacher-top principal-nom book-acc read-Q library-at librarian-dat told
The class teacher told the librarian at the library which student the principal read a book for.
